questions.question: What is the dominant color of the light bulb's body?
What is the overall shape of the bulb's light-emitting portion?
What type of base does the light bulb possess for fitting into a socket?
What material appears to constitute the majority of the light bulb's structure?
Is the surface of the light bulb predominantly smooth or textured?
Considering the bulb's design, what is its intended light distribution pattern?
Does the light bulb exhibit any visible markings or branding on its surface?
What is the approximate size of the light bulb in relation to a human hand?
Judging from its form, what is the likely application of this light bulb?
Does the light-emitting part of the bulb have a visible internal structure?
Based on its appearance, is the bulb designed for directional or ambient lighting?
What is the apparent finish of the bulb's outer surface, such as matte or glossy?
Observing the base, what is its diameter relative to the bulb's widest point?
Does the image suggest any visible heat sinks or cooling elements on the bulb?
Considering the design, is the bulb intended for general-purpose or specialized use?
